control.name: icbWindowStyle
control.description: This combo box allows you to select the manner in which the window for the process executed by the hyperlink editor should appear onscreen.

control.name: ceSingleClick
control.description: This check box controls how an end-user activates the hyperlink: with a single or double click.

control.name: teCaption
control.description: Use this text editor to specify the hyperlink editor's caption.

control.name: sbImageSet
control.description: Click this button to assign an image to the hyperlink editor.

control.name: sbImageClear
control.description: Click this button to clear the hyperlink editor's image.

control.name: icbAlignment
control.description: This combo box allows the alignment of the hyperlink editor's image to be specified. If the image is centered within the edit box, the link's caption is hidden.

control.name: hyperLinkEdit1
control.description: The OpenLink event is raised after an end-user has activated the hyperlink. This event allows you to modify the command which will be executed, perform additional action(s) and cancel the default processing (if necessary).

control.name: hyperLinkEdit2
control.description: The editor's ButtonClick event is handled to execute the specified command as a new process. This event is raised each time an end user clicks the hyperlink editor's 'Online Order' button.
